name: Life to its Fullest
description:
A short, 3 minute, multiple endings game about a man living life to its fullest (or not doing that, you'll just have to play to find out!).  Try exploring, or collecting coins, or just platforming around. Survive for 3 minutes to discover an ending! Made for Blackthornprod Gamejam 3,  the theme was "less is more".

------------------------

Controls:

arrow keys or wasd to move, w/up arrow/space to jump.

------------------------

Made By NivMizzer, Yoyosarefun123, and UpperAngel. All assets, music and sound effects were made by us during the jam.
